unnormalised: **Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to Higher Education Just Got Easier!**
normalised: **Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to Higher Education Just Got Easier!**

unnormalised: Tired of endless searches for scholarships? Relax, chill maaro! Ed-tech is here to rescue your education dreams. Scholarship portals are popping up like mushrooms after the monsoon, making finding financial aid way easier than perfecting your grandma's biryani recipe.
normalised: Tired of endless searches for scholarships? Relax, chill maaro! Ed-tech is here to rescue your education dreams. Scholarship portals are popping up like mushrooms after the monsoon, making finding financial aid way easier than perfecting your grandma's biryani recipe.

unnormalised: These online platforms, like Vidya Dhan and Scholarshipwale.com, are connecting students with opportunities across India. Forget sifting through dusty notice boards at Delhi University or IIT Madras.
normalised: These online platforms, like Vidya Dhan and Scholarshipwale dot com, are connecting students with opportunities across India. Forget sifting through dusty notice boards at Delhi University or I I T Madras.

unnormalised: Think of them as matrimonial sites for scholarships, matching your profile with the perfect funder. Many even offer filters – caste, merit, even your fav subject! Whether you need Rs. 50,000 for books or Rs. 5 Lakh for tuition, there's probably a scholarship out there.
normalised: Think of them as matrimonial sites for scholarships, matching your profile with the perfect funder. Many even offer filters – caste, merit, even your favorite subject! Whether you need rupees fifty thousand for books or rupees five lakh for tuition, there's probably a scholarship out there.

unnormalised: So, ditch the late-night chai fueled application frenzy. This Onam, give yourself the gift of a scholarship hunt powered by tech. Just remember to check the fine print, okay? Good luck, future doctors and engineers!
normalised: So, ditch the late-night chai fueled application frenzy. This Onam, give yourself the gift of a scholarship hunt powered by tech. Just remember to check the fine print, okay? Good luck, future doctors and engineers!
